comment: Very smooth, Carmel with sweet finish. 3/5

Nose: the very first seconds after filling a glass - alcohol scent and sweetness, afterwards vanilla and spices appear, following by a faint touch of fruits. Typical bourbon casks maturing. 
      Taste: sweetness, vanilla, oak, spices. Trivial, but pleasant. A bit harsh.
      Aftertaste: short and straightforward. 
      Overall: 2,7 stars (72 score)
Heerlijk zacht, rond, lichte rooktint maar geen turf.
friendly sipping whisky with walnut notes
